meanings.definition: The quality or state of being invasive.
meanings.sent1: The invasivenesses of the plant species caused harm to the local ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The invasivenesses of the vine led to it taking over the garden.
meanings.sent3: The invasivenesses of the curious puppy made it impossible to keep secrets.
meanings.sent4: The invasivenesses of the gossip spread like wildfire through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The invasivenesses of the loud music made it hard to concentrate.

meanings.definition: The tendency to spread and intrude upon other areas.
meanings.sent1: The invasivenesses of the ivy caused it to cover the entire wall.
meanings.sent2: The invasivenesses of the rumor quickly reached every corner of the school.
meanings.sent3: The invasivenesses of the overfriendly neighbor always led to unexpected visits.
meanings.sent4: The invasivenesses of technology have changed the way we interact with each other.
meanings.sent5: The invasivenesses of the scent filled the room, overpowering all other smells.
